name: Overcrafted (Wardergrip, jarnogabriel)
description:
FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED!

This is a submission for the Wowie! Jam 4.0. Theme being "Collaborate with an AI".

Overcrafted is our first game we worked on for a Jam. The game is inspired by Overcooked and games where crafting plays a big role. In Overcooked, your friends help you in the kitchen, in Overcrafted there is only an AI to help you out.  In our game you will be cooking some fine circuit boards, instead of crafting some delicious meals.

WR Tutorial 1 -> level 1 = 6:39 (By TipX)

  • Arrow keys or WASD - Movement
  • F - Pick Up / Drop / Put in machine
  • E - Use machine
  • Space - Throw
  • Mouse - Aim
  • P - Pause menu
  • Tab (Hold) - See all Recipes
